Articles.Content: Ever time I play the game, the terrain on Kerbin is all black and the sea is grey and upon re-entry to kerbin, my rockets turn purple. The glitch started happening shortly after installing Beta than ever. All my graphics drivers are up to date and the game cache integrity is all fine. Does any-one experience this and is there a way to fix it?

Sounds like bad graphics drivers, did you install the correct ones and reboot?

Please see the support stickies, we'll need more info from you on this one such as your logs, images of the issue and your dxdiag output

Sounds like bad graphics drivers, did you install the correct ones and reboot?

Please see the support stickies, we'll need more info from you on this one such as your logs, images of the issue and your dxdiag output

I've got the KSP log, dixdiag and a screenshot all in a zip.

https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B_4PVyOe7RW5SllDMDl0eHkwYTQ&usp=sharing

Hope it helps
When I run the game in windowed mode the textures return to normal.

When I run the game in windowed mode the textures return to normal.

Great!

If you want KSP to still take up the whole screen, you can also run it in "fake full screen" mode. Or borderless window mode. Just add the -popupwindow command to your shortcut and that'll make it run without the border around the window. When the resolution is up all the way, it looks just like full screen mode.

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
